name: Monolith (itch) (Josh Maggard)
description:
Ludum Dare 37
72-hour Jam Entry
(Xbox Controller Supported)

Trapped in a room with a strange monolithic object, as you collect the keys scattered around the room, you can't help but think that the tiny figure inside looks an awful lot like you.

Monolith is a 3D platformer with powerups and metroidvania-like gameplay.

Controls
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
J - Punch
K - Dash

Josh Maggard (@MaggardJosh)
Design - Code - Music

Dan Konves (@DankOvens)
Design - Code - Level Design

Denver Poteet (@DenverSkyline)
Design - Art - Music - SFX
